tr: compile-context.sh handles analyze, po, questionary, roadmap roles
ar: reference packages for all missing base roles

obj: Add missing compile-context.sh case blocks for Phase 1-2 agents (analyze, po, questionary, roadmap) and create reference packages for roles that lack them (analyze, po, questionary, roadmap, integration-gate, owner, scout, debugger, documenter).

a: Add analyze case block to compile-context.sh that emits phase, goal, and codebase mapping refs
v: bash compile-context.sh 01 analyze .vbw-planning/phases exits 0 and produces .ctx-analyze.toon
done: analyze role produces valid .ctx-analyze.toon with phase, goal, codebase refs

a: Add po, questionary, roadmap case blocks to compile-context.sh emitting role-appropriate context
v: bash compile-context.sh 01 po .vbw-planning/phases exits 0; same for questionary, roadmap

a: Create reference packages for missing roles: analyze, po, questionary, roadmap, integration-gate
v: Each .toon file exists, contains role-specific reference content, and is loadable by compile-context.sh
done: 5 new reference package files exist in references/packages/

a: Create reference packages for remaining missing roles: owner, scout, debugger, documenter
v: Each .toon file exists and follows existing package format pattern
done: 4 new reference package files exist in references/packages/

a: Add BATS tests for new compile-context.sh role case blocks
done: Tests verify analyze, po, questionary, roadmap roles produce valid output
